== Varavoor (627721) ==

Varavoor is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1145 hectares and harbouring 2097 households with total population of 8944 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 4278 and female population is 4666. Scheduled Caste Population is 1582 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 627721<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
